com.snakk.advertising
Interface SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener

Enclosing class:
SnakkBannerAdView
public static interface SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener

Implement this interface to be notified of banner ad lifecycle changes.

Method Summary
 void onBannerAdDismissFullscreen(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
          Called once a full screen ad has closed, leaving your app in the foreground
 void onBannerAdError(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd, String errorMsg)
          An error occurred while requesting an ad.
 void onBannerAdFullscreen(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
          Called just before an ad will go full-screen, covering up your app.
 void onBannerAdLeaveApplication(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
          Called just before an ad interaction will start a new app, sending yours to the background.
 void onReceiveBannerAd(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
          An ad was received and displayed.
 

Method Detail

onReceiveBannerAd

void onReceiveBannerAd(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
An ad was received and displayed.

Parameters:
bannerAd - the banner ad that loaded

onBannerAdError

void onBannerAdError(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd,
                     String errorMsg)
An error occurred while requesting an ad. Possible errors include network failure or no ad inventory to display for this session.

Parameters:
bannerAd - the banner ad which experienced an error
errorMsg - description of the error that occurred. Error messages are informational and are not generally displayed to the user.

onBannerAdFullscreen

void onBannerAdFullscreen(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
Called just before an ad will go full-screen, covering up your app.

Parameters:
bannerAd - the banner ad that is about to cover up your app

onBannerAdDismissFullscreen

void onBannerAdDismissFullscreen(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
Called once a full screen ad has closed, leaving your app in the foreground

Parameters:
bannerAd - the banner ad that just returned control to your app

onBannerAdLeaveApplication

void onBannerAdLeaveApplication(SnakkBannerAdView bannerAd)
Called just before an ad interaction will start a new app, sending yours to the background.

Parameters:
bannerAd - the banner ad that is causing your app to go into the background
